title: This Bissell Little Green pet machine is 29% off and “like having a tiny janitor”
description: A portable pet stain cleaner at the purr-fect price!
content:
We love our pets. And we’re so glad they have hair.

If they didn’t, they might look a little funny (no shade to hairless cats, mole rats, or the rare hairless dog). Crucially, though, we like hair when it’s on our dogs and cats. We really aren’t huge fans of it once it’s left their bodies.

At that point, it’s a nuisance, which is where the Bissell Little Green Pet Deluxe Portable Carpet Cleaner comes in. Available for 29% off today on Amazon, the Bissell Little Green is a tried, trusted, and true tool for getting rid of pesky pet hair, no matter how much your critter sheds.

One 5-star Amazon review even states that owning the Bissell Little Green Pet Deluxe is “like having a tiny janitor in your closet.” That’s just one of over 10,000 5-star reviews.

Still not sold? Wondering what makes this Little Green Deluxe Carpet Cleaner so deluxe? Included in the box are the carpet cleaner itself, the PetSpot & Stain+ PET OXY Boost formula, the 3-inch Tough Stain Tool, the Stain Trapper Tool, and the HydroRinse Self-Cleaning Tool, which makes cleaning your Bissell as easy as the push of a button.

The Bissell Little Green Pet Deluxe Portable Carpet Cleaner is a compact, powerful tool designed for pet owners. It effectively tackles tough stains, pet messes, and odors on carpets, upholstery, and car interiors. Featuring strong spray and suction, it’s easy to use and lightweight. Its included pet tools and trial-size formulas make deep cleaning convenient and efficient, even in tight spaces. Best of all? It’s available for 29% off for a limited time this week on Amazon.

Check out the New York Post Shopping section for more content.

the Bissell Little Green Pet Deluxe Portable Carpet Cleaner

summary: The Bissell Little Green Pet Deluxe Portable Carpet Cleaner is being discounted at 29% on Amazon. The compact tool is designed for pet use, tackling stains, pet messes, and odors on carpets, upholstery, and car interiors. It also includes the PetSpot & Stain+ PET OXY Boost formula, the 3-inch Tough Stain Tool, the Stain Trapper Tool, and the HydroRinse Self-Cleaning Tool. The product is available for a limited time on Amazon and comes with over 10,000 reviews.
shortSummary: The Bissell Little Green Pet Deluxe Portable Carpet Cleaner, available for 29% on Amazon, removes pet hair and is easy to use with included tools.

scraped_sources.text:
It’s no secret that we love Amazon.
New here? We’re happy to tell you why: The e-tail giant has the best deals on the market, every time. It comes with being the biggest in the game. When you’ve got cash to throw around, you won’t mind marking a portable charger down a few bucks more than your competitors.
That is: there’s so much to save on in any given day, it can be difficult to know where to look first! This, we think, is a good problem to have, especially when you’ve got a team like Post Wanted on your side.
Deals are our bread and butter, which makes Amazon sort of a bread and butter factory. The question is: are you hungry for savings? We hope so because below, we’ve compiled a list of the best deals available on Amazon, including huge savings on brands like Apple, DeWalt, Dyson, and more.
Treat yourself with a shopping spree –– without having to break the bank –– thanks to Amazon’s doorbuster deals, available all week long.
VEAGASO 2500 Sq.Ft Dehumidifier for Home
The VEAGASO dehumidifier covers up to 2,500 sq ft, removing up to 34 pints per day under 95 °F conditions. It offers adjustable humidity (30–80 % RH), three operating modes, auto/manual drainage, quiet operation (<40 dB), a digital touchscreen, 24‑hour timer, child lock, reusable filter, hidden handles, and rolling wheels for portability.
LEVOIT Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
The LEVOIT Cordless Vacuum Cleaner (models LVAC‑200 and upgraded LVAC‑300) is a lightweight, stick-style unit (around 3–6 lbs) offering cordless flexibility. It features anti‑tangle roller brushes, HEPA filtration (~99.9 % of particles), removable batteries, and runtime up to 50–60 minutes in eco mode. Ideal for hardwood, low‑pile carpet, and pet hair cleanup.
REDTIGER Golf Rangefinder with Slope
The REDTIGER Golf Rangefinder with Slope is a compact, easy-to-use device designed to improve accuracy on the course. It features slope adjustment, flag-lock technology, and vibration feedback for confident targeting. With fast readings and clear optics, it helps golfers choose the right club and shot. Ideal for players of all levels, it enhances precision and performance.
Apple 2025 MacBook Air 13-inch Laptop with M4 Chip
The 2025 MacBook Air (13‑inch) with the M4 chip delivers a 10‑core CPU, up to 10‑core GPU, and a 16‑core Neural Engine. Its 13.6″ Liquid Retina display supports 1 billion colors. Features include a 12 MP Center Stage camera with Desk View, support for two external 6K monitors, MagSafe charging, Wi‑Fi 6E, and up to 18 hours battery life.
Apple AirPods Pro 2 Wireless Earbuds
Apple AirPods Pro 2 wireless earbuds deliver class‑leading active noise cancellation powered by the H2 chip, transparency and adaptive audio modes, spatial audio, and built‑in hearing‑aid enhancement, all wrapped in a sweat‑resistant MagSafe USB‑C case. Right now, Amazon is featuring them at their lowest price ever, making this a rare chance to grab Apple’s top in‑ear experience.
Technivorm Moccamaster 53923 KBGV Select 10-Cup Coffee Maker
The Technivorm Moccamaster 53923 KBGV Select is a premium 10‑cup drip coffee maker, handmade in the Netherlands, featuring a precise copper heating element that reaches the ideal 196–205 degrees Fahrenheit brewing temperature. It brews a full pot in just 4–6 minutes, with a half‑pot selector and auto shut‑off after 100 minutes. Quiet, reliable, and backed by a five‑year warranty, it’s a cult favorite among coffee lovers.
Apple AirTag 4 Pack
The Apple AirTag 4 Pack is a convenient solution for keeping track of personal items. Each compact, lightweight AirTag uses Bluetooth to help locate things like keys, bags, and wallets via the Find My app. With precise location tracking, an easy setup, and a replaceable battery, it’s perfect for anyone seeking to stay organized and secure.
Waterpik Cordless Advanced 2.0 Water Flosser
The Waterpik Cordless Advanced 2.0 is a compact, rechargeable, and ADA-accepted water flosser designed for travel and small spaces. It features three pressure settings, a 360° rotating tip, and a 7 oz reservoir delivering about 45 seconds of flossing time. With PrecisionPulse technology it removes up to 99.9% of plaque, charges via magnetic USB in four hours, and runs up to four weeks per charge.
Buzbug LED Bug Zapper
The Buzbug LED Bug Zapper is a compact, eco-friendly insect control device that uses UV light to attract and eliminate flying pests. Ideal for indoor and outdoor use, it operates quietly and efficiently without harmful chemicals. Its sleek, portable design makes it easy to use anywhere, offering a safer, cleaner alternative to traditional bug sprays and traps.
Bodum Chambord French Press Coffee Maker
The Bodum Chambord French Press Coffee Maker makes barista-style brews in minutes. It’s a classic and affordable choice for brewing rich, full-bodied coffee, featuring a heat-resistant borosilicate glass carafe and a durable stainless steel frame. We love its look, too.
LEGO Botanicals Lucky Bamboo Building Set
The LEGO Botanicals Lucky Bamboo set offers a tranquil and creative building experience for adults. This 325-piece set features three lifelike bamboo stems, a clay-colored pot, decorative pebbles, and a wood-effect plinth. Standing over 11 inches tall, it symbolizes good fortune and the summer season in traditional art. Ideal as a thoughtful gift or a serene addition to any space.
more lego deals
WilFiks Weed Puller Tool
The WilFiks Weed Puller Tool is a durable, ergonomic gardening tool designed for efficient weed removal. Its long handle minimizes back strain, while the clawed head grips weeds firmly, pulling them out by the roots. Ideal for lawns and gardens, it offers a chemical-free solution to weed control. Lightweight yet sturdy, it’s perfect for regular maintenance.
StarOcean Inflatable Pool with Lights
The StarOcean Inflatable Pool transforms any backyard into a vibrant summer oasis with its generous size, 300-gallon capacity and mesmerizing color-changing LED lights that set the perfect mood for evening dips. Crafted from sturdy, puncture-resistant PVC and designed with three independent air chambers, this pool is the it-product of summer.
ThermoPro TempSpike Plus 600ft Wireless Meat Thermometer
The ThermoPro TempSpike Plus 600ft Wireless Meat Thermometer is a versatile tool designed for precision cooking. Its Bluetooth 5.2 technology offers a 600-foot range, allowing remote monitoring via a smartphone app. The ultra-thin, IP67 waterproof probe ensures minimal juice loss and easy cleanup. With customizable alerts and USDA temperature guidelines, it enhances cooking accuracy. The Smart Booster Display provides real-time temperature readings, eliminating the need to constantly check your phone.
Craftsman VERSASTACK Mechanics Tool Set
The Craftsman VERSASTACK Mechanics Tool Set offers a versatile solution for DIY enthusiasts and professionals alike. Designed to integrate seamlessly with the VERSASTACK storage system, it ensures easy organization and portability. The set features a 72-tooth ratchet with a 5-degree arc swing, providing access in tight spaces. Crafted with a full polish chrome finish, the tools are corrosion-resistant and backed by a full lifetime warranty. This comprehensive set is ideal for tackling a variety of mechanical tasks.
grace & stella Under Eye Mask (24 Pairs, Gold)
These luxurious gold eye masks by grace & stella hydrate and reduce puffiness and dark circles. Infused with collagen and nourishing ingredients, they refresh tired eyes in just 15–20 minutes. Perfect for self-care routines, travel, or prepping for big events, they deliver spa-like results from the comfort of home.
Calvin Klein Men’s Cotton Classics 3-Pack Boxer Brief
The Calvin Klein Men’s Cotton Classics 3-Pack Boxer Brief offers a comfortable and breathable fit, crafted from soft cotton fabric. Designed for everyday wear, these boxer briefs feature an elastic waistband with the iconic Calvin Klein logo. The modern, sleek cut provides a supportive and snug fit, making them an essential addition to any wardrobe for all-day comfort.
New Apple iPad 11-inch with A16 chip
The new 11th-generation iPad, released on March 12, 2025, features the A16 chip, offering up to 50% faster performance than its predecessor. It boasts a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, 6GB of RAM, and starts with 128GB of storage. Available in four colors, it supports Apple Pencil (1st and 2nd generations) and the Magic Keyboard Folio.
L’Oreal Paris True Match Lumi Glotion
L’Oreal True Match Lumi Glotion provides an instant glow with a dewy finish. This lightweight formula hydrates while brightening skin, leaving it radiant. It can be worn alone or under makeup for a natural, luminous look, perfect for achieving a fresh complexion.
L’Oréal Paris Colour Riche Satin Lipstick
The L’Oréal Paris Colour Riche Satin Lipstick offers a smooth, luxurious finish with vibrant color. Its moisturizing formula nourishes lips, keeping them soft and hydrated all day. Available in a wide range of shades, this lipstick is perfect for those who want bold, lasting color with a satin feel.
Aquasonic Black Series Ultra Whitening Toothbrush
The Aquasonic Black Series Ultra Whitening Toothbrush offers a premium brushing experience with advanced sonic technology. Its high-frequency vibrations help to remove plaque and stains effectively. Featuring multiple brushing modes, it’s designed to improve gum health and teeth whiteness. The sleek, modern design and long-lasting battery make it a top choice.
Chom Chom Roller Pet Hair Remover and Reusable Lint Roller
The Chom Chom Roller is a pet hair remover that effectively captures hair from furniture, clothing, and car interiors without the need for sticky sheets or batteries. Its reusable design makes it an eco-friendly option for pet owners. A strong brush action quickly removes fur, leaving surfaces clean and hair-free.
GoodBaby No-Touch Thermometer for Adults and Kids
The GoodBaby No-Touch Thermometer provides quick and accurate temperature readings without contact, making it perfect for both adults and kids. The large digital display shows readings in seconds, and its silent mode ensures comfort during use. This thermometer is easy to use, hygienic, and reliable for monitoring health at home.
Aikoper 1500W Space Heater
The Aikoper 1500W Space Heater offers rapid warmth for small to medium-sized rooms. Equipped with adjustable settings, it provides customized comfort and energy efficiency. Its quiet operation and compact design make it ideal for bedrooms, offices, or living spaces, while the overheat protection ensures safety during use.
Nextmug Temperature-Controlled, Self-Heating Coffee Mug
Nextmug’s self-heating coffee mug maintains your beverage at the perfect temperature for hours. Featuring a rechargeable battery and adjustable temperature settings, it’s ideal for those who enjoy sipping at their own pace. With its sleek design and ergonomic handle, this mug ensures your drink stays warm without constant reheating.
SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch Ultra 47mm LTE AI Smartwatch
The SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch Ultra combines robust health tracking with sleek design. It features an expansive display and built-in LTE for on-the-go connectivity. Advanced sensors monitor heart rate, oxygen levels, and sleep patterns, providing comprehensive wellness insights. With customizable watch faces, it blends style with functionality seamlessly.
LEGO Icons Orchid Set
The LEGO Icons Orchid Set brings delicate beauty to life with its intricate design and vibrant colors. Perfect for botanical enthusiasts and LEGO collectors alike, it captures the elegance of an orchid in stunning detail, making it a standout piece.
ErGear L-Shaped Electric Standing Desk
Elevate your work experience with ErGear’s L-Shaped Electric Standing Desk. Perfect for ergonomic comfort, its customizable height settings and spacious design empower productivity while reducing strain. Say goodbye to sedentary workdays.
Bio-Oil Skincare Body Oil
Embrace skin nourishment with Bio-Oil Skincare Body Oil. Formulated with breakthrough PurCellin Oil, it targets scars, stretch marks, and uneven skin tone. Absorbs quickly, leaving skin soft, supple, and radiant.
Why Trust Post Wanted by the New York Post
This article was written by P.J. McCormick, New York Post Commerce Deals Writer/Reporter. P.J. is an expert deal-finder, sifting through endless brands and retailers to deliver only the best savings opportunities on truly worthwhile products. P.J. finds Prime Day-worthy deals all year long on some of our favorite products we’ve tested and our readers’ beloved best-sellers, from Wayfair furniture sales to the lowest prices on Apple AirPods. P.J. has been scouring sales for Post Wanted shoppers since 2022 and previously held positions at Rolling Stone, Pitchfork and Hyperallergic. Please note that deals can expire, and all prices are subject to change.
Hunting for a headline-worthy haul? Keep shopping with Post Wanted.

argos_summary: The Bissell Little Green Pet Deluxe Portable Carpet Cleaner is a highly-rated tool designed for pet owners to effectively remove pet hair, stains, and odors from various surfaces. Currently available at a 29% discount on Amazon, it includes several useful attachments and cleaning formulas, making it convenient for deep cleaning. With over 10,000 five-star reviews, users praise its efficiency and ease of use, likening it to having a 'tiny janitor' at home.
